title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Save Prompt, Share Prompt, and Try in App release
description: With this feature, users of Copilot in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote will be able to save prompts that they have created to Copilot Lab and share them with their coworkers. Also, users on the Copilot Lab website who find a Word, Excel, PowerPoint, or OneNote prompt that they like will be able to launch Copilot and run that prompt with a single click of the new "Try in Copilot" button.
